name: Prism Warriors (Demo)
description:
Prism Warriors is an 8-bit bullet hell shooter developed in the TIC-80 engine, and the sequel to Prism Indigo. Take control of one of the seven Prism Warriors, take advantage of their brand-new Passive and Special abilities, and blast your way through hordes of Shades in search of the mastermind behind the Shadow Empire's latest invasion of Earth.

This is only a one-level demo; the full game is scheduled for release in 2023.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Shoot / Select
  • X: Use Burst / Cancel
  • S: Use Special
